content:
[Slack](https://slack.com) has introduced [reactions](http://slackhq.com/post/123561085920/reactions): a method of responding to a message with emoji. 

I like it. It's a more nuanced like/favourite to allow for dislikes ğŸ‘, thanks ğŸ‘ or inevitably ğŸ’©. I can see this idea spreading to other services very quickly. I wonder how it might work in the #indieweb world?
summary: .@SlackHQ has introduced reactions: a method of responding to a message with emoji http://slackhq.com/post/123561085920/reactions - I can see this idea spreading...
